content: Today @ ACT, I will be in Linguistics Jitsu 2-3 UTC and in Quantum Jitsu 3-4 UTC.

Here are the addresses (of those and more rooms):

- Coffee – casual chatting
- Pub – casual chatting
- Dynamical – things occurring in time, Petri nets, robotics, etc.
- Quantum – all things quantum
- Linguistics – language, NLP
- Types – type theory, programming language theory
- Probability - random topics are welcome and encouraged
- Philosophy – what is behind it all?
- Tools – what software do we need? how do we design it?
- PureCT – pure category theory discussions
- AppliedApplied – like actually applied
- Flourish – strategies for the flourishing of ACT
- Ethics – what makes a good world and how do we fit into that?
Everyone spelling Jitsi wrong, probably because of autocorrect.... just in case anyone is searching to download it.....

Hi Paolo, I just sent you a message that seems to have been lost in translation, asking whether it would be possible to create a
jitsi room devoted to theoretical biology, alchemy (algebraic chemistry) , cognitive science, etc, so a sort of soft and wet ACT jitsi room?
Congrats for the organization, by the way!
Hi Jorge. With Jitsi you can create your own room, so feel free :)
Just learned of this now, how active are have these Jitsi rooms been so far?
A bunch of people are hanging out here, too: https://gather.town/n3WuxZO61Xq9p1Gq/act2020
We had a fun chat in the "pub" yesterday.

B Cohen said:

Just learned of this now, how active are have these Jitsi rooms been so far?

From my experience there weren't active at all outside of coffee breaks or, in other words, anytime I remembered to try :slight_smile: . I have no data if they were used much during the designated times.
